languages.text: {n}Повернувшись к вам, Паскаль тихо замечает.{/n} "Это был ответ на бинарном наречии. Примитивный, грубый... но верный".
{n}Pasqal turns to you and remarks quietly,{/n} "That reply was in a binharic dialect. Primitive and crude... but correct."
languages.original_text: {n}Повернувшись к вам, Паскаль тихо замечает.{/n} "Это был ответ на бинарном наречии. Примитивный, грубый... но верный".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal turns to you and remarks quietly,{/n} "That reply was in a binharic dialect. Primitive and crude... but correct."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルはあなたの方を向いて静かに語る。{/n}「先の応答はビンハリック方言でした。原始的で粗さはあるが…正確なものです」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns to you and remarks quietly,{/n} "That reply was in a binharic dialect. Primitive and crude... but correct."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルはあなたの方を向いて静かに語る。{/n}「先の応答はビンハリック方言でした。原始的で粗さはあるが…正確なものです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡转向你，平静地说。{/n}“刚刚的回答是用二进制方言说的。原始而粗糙……但符合规范。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns to you and remarks quietly,{/n} "That reply was in a binharic dialect. Primitive and crude... but correct."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡转向你，平静地说。{/n}“刚刚的回答是用二进制方言说的。原始而粗糙……但符合规范。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous pour expliquer à mi-voix :{/n} « Il s'agit d'un dialecte binhaire. Primitif et rustique... mais correct. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns to you and remarks quietly,{/n} "That reply was in a binharic dialect. Primitive and crude... but correct."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se tourne vers vous pour expliquer à mi-voix :{/n} « Il s'agit d'un dialecte binhaire. Primitif et rustique... mais correct. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal se gira hacia ti y comenta con tranquilidad:{/n} «Esa respuesta estaba en un dialecto binario. Bastante primitivo y ordinario... pero correcto».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns to you and remarks quietly,{/n} "That reply was in a binharic dialect. Primitive and crude... but correct."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal se gira hacia ti y comenta con tranquilidad:{/n} «Esa respuesta estaba en un dialecto binario. Bastante primitivo y ordinario... pero correcto».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal wendet sich zu dir und bemerkt leise:{/n} "Diese Antwort ist in einem binhären Dialekt erfolgt. Primitiv und krude ... aber korrekt."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns to you and remarks quietly,{/n} "That reply was in a binharic dialect. Primitive and crude... but correct."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal wendet sich zu dir und bemerkt leise:{/n} "Diese Antwort ist in einem binhären Dialekt erfolgt. Primitiv und krude ... aber korrekt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sana dönüp alçak sesle belirtiyor.{/n} "Bir ikilidil lehçesinde yanıt verdi. İlkel ve kabaca ancak doğru yanıt."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal turns to you and remarks quietly,{/n} "That reply was in a binharic dialect. Primitive and crude... but correct."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sana dönüyor ve sessizce belirtiyor:{/n} "Yanıt bir ikilidil lehçesindeydi. İlkel ve kabacaydı ancak doğruydu."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
